settings.serverUrlDesc: Complete address of AList server, e.g.: http://localhost:5244
settings.rootPathDesc: Root path for AList file browsing, default is root directory
settings.autoLoginDesc: Automatically login to AList server on startup
settings.lastPathDesc: Record last visited folder path for restoration on next open
settings.usageInstructionsDesc: After configuration, AList file browser will be displayed in the sidebar. Please ensure AList server is running and network connection is normal.

errors.configRequired: Please configure AList server information in settings first
errors.selectSingleFileToRename: Rename operation can only select one file
errors.selectFilesToMove: Please select files or folders to move
errors.selectSingleItemToMove: Move operation can only select one file or folder
errors.selectSingleFolderToMove: Move operation can only select one folder
errors.invalidServerUrl: ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid server URL format, please enter a valid URL (e.g.: http://localhost:5244)
errors.networkError: üåê Network connection failed: Unable to connect to AList server, please check server address and network connection
errors.authError: üîê Authentication failed: Incorrect username or password, please check login credentials
errors.forbiddenError: ‚õî Access denied: Insufficient account permissions or account disabled
errors.notFoundError: ‚ùì Server not found: Please check if AList server address is correct
errors.timeoutError: ‚è±Ô∏è Connection timeout: Server response timeout, please try again later
errors.loginExpired: üîê Login expired: Please login to AList server again
errors.accessDenied: ‚õî Access denied: No permission to access this path
errors.pathNotFound: üìÇ Path not found: The specified folder path does not exist
errors.loadTimeout: ‚è±Ô∏è Load timeout: Server response timeout, please try again later
errors.unknownError: ‚ùå Unknown error, please check server configuration

messages.previewNotSupported: Preview not supported for this file type
messages.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items? This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmMoveMessage: Are you sure you want to move the selected items?
messages.configFirst: Please configure server URL, username and password first

placeholders.downloadUrls:
Please enter download URLs, one per line
Example:
https://example.com/file1.zip
https://example.com/file2.pdf

tooltips.retryFailedTasks: Retry all failed offline download tasks
tooltips.clearSuccessTasks: Clear all successful offline download tasks
tooltips.clearCompletedTasks: Clear all completed offline download tasks
